DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate quality of life (Qol) in postmenopausal HR (+) EBC patients during adjuvant AIs treatment in terms of: the change of the trial outcome index (TOI) of the FACT-B questionnaire from baseline to 24 months. This study will recruit approximately 500 patients from 21 sites in China. The patients should be postmenopausal HR (+) EBC patients who have already start adjuvant AIs treatment but within 7 days.
DOC.brief_title: Quality of Life in Chinese Postmenopausal HR(+) Early Breast Cancer (EBC) Patients During Adjuvant Aromatase Inhibitors(AIs) Treatment
